content: this pattern combines mosaic crochet with the timeless granny stitch for a beautiful square with a homey inviting look this square is perfect to add to crochet sampler blankets pillows wall hangings or any project this granny square is a great intro project for overlay mosaic crochet in the round or for crocheters who want to try a unique twist on the traditional granny square the pattern comes with written instructions and a chart as well as link to a full video tutorial for the square unique features- a fun twist on the traditional granny square adorable mosaic crochet heart motif surrounded by rounds of granny stitch detailed written pattern with chart and full video tutorial for the square perfect addition to sampler blankets or any project materials needed- stitch markers hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn worsted weight approx 80 yards each of 2 colors gauges 9 stitches x 4 row = 4 inches in square 9 rounds = 4 square
